Adelwyn: ^Hey, something's going on with the Lothwins, mind looking into that for me?
AdelwynPhase2: ^There have been reports of strange behavior and rising tensions ever since Loftwin obtained some new relic. The townsfolk are worried. Can you investigate?
AdelwynPhase3: ^You might want to start by talking to some of the locals. They might have seen something unusual. Good luck.
